reviewText: I got a bunch of cemetery DVD's last year for Christmas, as I have a cemetery photography business that goes by the name of "Graveyard Walker", and also I work locally in cemetery preservation, so these were all very entertaining and appropriate for me!! :D
This item was bought as a gift and was well received, but I cannot give a review further than that because I never watched the film.

I work for a Cemetery District, and I have been purchasing DVD's about cemetery information to increase my knowledge.  This is a great one to see, it really gives one an overview of cemetery history.  You will find it informative, entertaining, and very interesting.
